Detailed Description

An abstract class used by DzShape to instance itself in multiple locations in the scene.

Note:
When shape renders or draws it is given the world space geometry. To handle the instances correctly this geometry needs to be taken back into local space by inversing out the World Space transform. Then for each instance the new World Space transform form DzAbstractShapeInstance::getWSTransform() should be applied.
